docs.snippet: In the new Disney film "Million Dollar Arm," Jon Hamm is soaked in perspiration, not the alcohol-induced sweat of his "Mad Men" character Don Draper, but the kind that comes from filming a modest production in India in the hottest part of the year...
docs.lead_paragraph: In the new Disney film "Million Dollar Arm," Jon Hamm is soaked in perspiration, not the alcohol-induced sweat of his "Mad Men" character Don Draper, but the kind that comes from filming a modest production in India in the hottest part of the year.

headline.main: Disney Throws Another Feel-Good Pitch With 'Million Dollar Arm'
headline.print_headline: Disney Throws Another Feel-Good Pitch With 'Million Dollar Arm'

docs.snippet: The artist, known for making work that playfully riffs on outdated technology, debuts a line of sweats, linens and tech-cases designed to make life more comfortable for Internet addicts....

docs.snippet: The Broadway Oyster Bar may be a mere block from the home stadium of the St. Louis Cardinals, but its heart lies in another Mississippi River city nearly 700 miles south....

docs.snippet: Daniel Murphy stood in the batter's box, twisting his body as if he were directing the flight of his soaring drive down the right field line....

docs.snippet: Yasiel Puig extended his career-best hitting streak to 12 games with his third home run in four days, a go-ahead three-run shot, and drew a bases-loaded walk in the Los Angeles Dodgers' 6-5 win over the Florida Marlins on Monday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Yasiel Puig extended his career-best hitting streak to 12 games with his third home run in four days, a go-ahead three-run shot, and drew a bases-loaded walk in the Los Angeles Dodgers' 6-5 win over the Florida Marlins on Monday night.

headline.main: Puig's 3-Run HR Helps Dodgers Beat Marlins
headline.print_headline: Puig's 3-Run HR Helps Dodgers Beat Marlins
